long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension to help you memorise new words.
Read and learn.
Replaces occurrences of the words in your browser.
Actions:
1. Create a replacement as "word in your language" to "word in your target language".
Add pronunciation and mnemonic note if required.
2. Activate replacement. Set status to "learning".
3. Enable extension by clicking on the switch.
4. Visit your favourite sites and read content with replaced words.
5. In case of not remembering the word just double click on it to see the info.
6. When you know the pronunciation and/or meaning well enough, disable the pronunciation or mark the word as learned.
7. Repeat and enjoy.
